TopicTitle: How do you launch CSS with mechjeb?

Articles.Content: So I have the newest version of mechjeb and component space shuttle for KSP 1.0.4. My problem is whenever I launch, I would get to 40,000 m then fall back down. What settings should I use for ascent guidance? I am using the default ascent path of 40% turn angle.
Moving this mod-related question over to General Add-on Affairs.
